title: Rust Daily Utilities
shortDescription: A unified Rust desktop app for everything — image editing, disk searching, file management, and more.
description: A personal productivity powerhouse built in Rust with egui. Combines everything needed in daily life: image editing, deep disk search, file management utilities, async operations, and threading — all in a single snappy native app. Multiple squares for various actions, all at the same time. Scroll-view for even larger storage!
